tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (1/2) What did social distancing look like in the 19th century? After witnessing the cholera outbreak across the Ottoman Empire, this official writes to Washington suggesting quarantine measures on arriving ships from affected areas: go.usa.gov/xvKHM #FRUS #FSIatHome
